column1: apoc.spatial.geocode('address', maxResults, quotaException, $config) YIELD location, latitude, longitude, description, osmData - look up geographic location of address from a geocoding service (the default one is OpenStreetMap)

apoc.spatial.geocodeOnce('address', $config) YIELD location, latitude, longitude, description, osmData - look up geographic location of address from a geocoding service (the default one is OpenStreetMap)

apoc.spatial.reverseGeocode(latitude,longitude, quotaException, $config) YIELD location, latitude, longitude, description - look up address from latitude and longitude from a geocoding service (the default one is OpenStreetMap)
apoc.spatial.sortByDistance(List<Path>) sort the given paths based on the geo informations (lat/long) in ascending order
